name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-home-assistant
description: MCP server for Home Assistant integration
author: Anthropic, PBC (https://anthropic.com)

HOME_ASSISTANT_API_URL.description: The URL of your Home Assistant instance (e.g., http://localhost:8123)
HOME_ASSISTANT_API_URL.instructions: Set this to the URL of your Home Assistant instance. You can find this by opening your Home Assistant instance in a web browser and copying the URL from the address bar.

HOME_ASSISTANT_API_TOKEN.description: Your Home Assistant long-lived access token
HOME_ASSISTANT_API_TOKEN.instructions: Set this to your Home Assistant long-lived access token. You can generate this token by going to your user profile in Home Assistant, scrolling down to the 'Long-Lived Access Tokens' section, and creating a new token.
